Error_Message: Address lacks leading number followed by street name
Description: Address does not start with a number followed by a street name
Resolution: Ensure address begins with house/building number

Description: Address contains fewer than 5 non-space characters
Resolution: Provide a complete street address with house number and street name

Description: Address field is empty or contains only whitespace

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: Address lacks leading number followed by street name
Description: Address was corrected but still does not start with a number and street name

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: Address too short
Description: Address was corrected but still contains fewer than 5 non-space characters

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: Blank or whitespace-only value
Description: Address was corrected but is still empty

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: Invalid format
Description: Address was corrected but still contains forbidden characters or invalid formatting

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: Lacks standard street ending
Description: Address was corrected but still lacks a recognized street ending

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: No house number
Description: Address was corrected but still lacks a house number
Resolution: Include house number at start of address

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: Non-address content detected
Description: Address was corrected but still contains non-address patterns

Error_Message: Corrected address is still invalid: PO Boxes not allowed
Description: Address was corrected but still contains PO Box references
Address contains forbidden characters or invalid formatting
Resolution: Remove special characters and use standard address format

Description: Address does not contain a recognized street ending (St, Ave, Rd, etc.)
Resolution: Add appropriate street suffix (ST, AVE, RD, DR, etc.)

Description: Address has a street ending but no house number before the street name
Resolution: Add house or building number at the beginning of address

Description: Address contains non-address patterns like TBD, N/A, UNKNOWN, or phone numbers
Address contains PO Box, P.O. Box, or similar postal box references
Resolution: Provide physical street address instead of PO Box

Description: Address contained 'PR' which was converted to 'PVT RD'
Business customer field is empty or contains only whitespace
Business customer value is not 0 (residential) or 1 (business)
Resolution: Use 0 for residential or 1 for business customer

Description: City field is empty or contains only whitespace
City name contains invalid special characters
Resolution: Remove special characters from city name

Description: Customer field is empty or contains only whitespace
Customer ID contained a comma character which is not allowed

Error_Message: Duplicate customer ID, identical row deleted
Description: Row was removed because it had identical customer ID and data to another row
Resolution: Remove duplicate entries or modify customer ID

Description: Customer ID was renamed with a suffix to ensure uniqueness
Resolution: Review renamed customer ID for accuracy

Description: Download speed field is empty or contains only whitespace

Error_Message: Download speed must be a number
Description: Download speed value cannot be converted to a valid number
Download speed value is negative or zero
Latitude value is outside the valid range for the specified state
Resolution: Check latitude is within state boundaries

Description: Latitude value must be positive for states in the northern hemisphere
Resolution: Use positive latitude for northern hemisphere states

Error_Message: Latitude for AS must be negative
Description: American Samoa latitude values must be negative (southern hemisphere)
Resolution: Use negative latitude for American Samoa

Description: Latitude value cannot be converted to a valid number
Latitude value is outside the valid global range

Error_Message: Paired coordinate reset due to invalid lon
Description: Latitude was reset to blank because longitude was invalid
Resolution: Fix longitude first, then provide valid latitude

Description: Longitude value must be negative for most US states (western hemisphere)
Resolution: Use negative longitude for western hemisphere locations

Description: Longitude value cannot be converted to a valid number
Longitude value is outside the valid range for the specified state
Resolution: Check longitude is within state boundaries

Error_Message: Paired coordinate reset due to invalid lat
Description: Longitude was reset to blank because latitude was invalid
Resolution: Fix latitude first, then provide valid longitude

Description: Required columns are missing from the input CSV file
Resolution: Ensure all required columns are present in CSV

Description: State field is empty or contains only whitespace
State value is not a valid 2-letter state abbreviation
Resolution: Use standard 2-letter state abbreviation (e.g., CA, TX, NY)

Description: Technology field is empty or contains only whitespace
Technology value is not in the list of valid technologies
Resolution: Use one of: wireless_unlicensed, wireless_gaa, wireless_pal, wireless_educational, fiber, cable, adsl2, ethernet, voip

Description: Upload speed field is empty or contains only whitespace

Error_Message: Upload speed must be a number
Description: Upload speed value cannot be converted to a valid number
Upload speed value is negative or zero
VoIP lines field is empty or contains only whitespace

Error_Message: VoIP lines must be a non-negative integer
Description: VoIP lines value is negative or not a whole number
Resolution: Provide non-negative whole number for VoIP lines

Error_Message: VoIP lines must be a number
Description: VoIP lines value cannot be converted to a valid number
Resolution: Provide numeric value for VoIP lines

Description: ZIP code field is empty or contains only whitespace
ZIP code failed validation during Excel export processing
Resolution: Verify ZIP code format and validity

Description: ZIP code is not in valid 5-digit or 5+4 digit format
ZIP code contains invalid characters
Resolution: Use only numbers and hyphens in ZIP code
